title: 'I'd give Bamford a go for England' - striker scores 100th goal as Leeds beat Palace
description: Patrick Bamford scores the 100th goal of his career as Leeds gain a deserved win over Crystal Palace to move 10th in the Premier League.

title: Which new signing is flying in the face of his critics? And who else made Garth Crooks' team of the week?
description: Whose defending was magnificent? Who answered his critics with an excellent performance? Find out in Garth Crooks' team of the week.

title: Daniel Kinahan says drug gang claims a 'campaign' against him
description: Daniel Kinahan says his success planning world title fights led to false claims he runs a drug cartel.

title: Amazing escape as Utah avalanche buries snowmobilers
description: Dramatic video shows an avalanche burying a group of snowmobilers on the same day another slide kills four.

title: Manchester Covid surge tests as mutation of Kent variant confirmed
description: Four cases of a new mutation of the Kent coronavirus variant are confirmed in Manchester.

title: Fifa Club World Cup: Robert Lewandowski double sends Bayern Munich to final
description: Robert Lewandowski's two goals help Bayern Munich beat Egyptian side Al Ahly 2-0 to reach the Fifa Club World Cup final.

title: Covid: Why Australia's 'world-class' quarantine system has seen breaches

description: Storm Darcy has brought freezing temperatures and snow to parts of the UK.

title: Is guiding the Buccaneers to glory Brady's greatest achievement?
description: Is transforming a struggling team to Super Bowl glory in one season the best achievement of 43-year-old Tom Brady's incredible career?

title: Dorothy Perkins? Why would Boohoo want that?
description: Online fashion giant Boohoo has mopped up the last of Arcadia's retail empire - did it need them?

title: UK's youngest terror offender, boy, 16, sentenced
description: The boy downloaded his first bomb-making manual aged 13, and became the leader of a neo-Nazi group.

title: F1 champion Hamilton signs new Mercedes contract
description: Formula 1 world champion Lewis Hamilton signs a new one-year contract with Mercedes.

title: England in India: Joe Root's side set up push for victory in Chennai
description: England need nine wickets on the final day to beat India after setting up their victory push on day four of the first Test in Chennai.

title: UK terrorism threat level lowered to 'substantial'
description: It comes after a "significant reduction" in the momentum of attacks in Europe, the home secretary says.

title: Covid: Scientists developing vaccine boosters to tackle variants
description: An early study suggests the AstraZeneca vaccine may be less effective against the South African variant.

title: London violence: Sven Badzak 'could have been prime minister'
description: Sven Badzak's political ambitions were brutally cut short in a stabbing attack in north London.

title: Holyrood inquiry session with Salmond called off
description: The former first minister was due to answer MSP questions on Tuesday, but the session will not go ahead.

title: Referee Mike Dean tells police about death threats
description: Premier League referee Mike Dean notifies police after his family received death threats and abusive messages.

title: UK weather: Storm Darcy leads to heavy snow and ice
description: Police warn people not to travel as the cold weather causes vaccination centres and schools to shut.

title: Wolf Alice's Ellie Rowsell accuses Marilyn Manson of upskirt filming
description: British singer Ellie Rowsell is the latest to makes claims about the rock star's behaviour.

title: Queen did not block legislation, Buckingham Palace says
description: Archive papers suggest the monarch's lawyers successfully argued to change a draft law in the 1970s.

title: Boohoo buys Dorothy Perkins, Wallis and Burton but 2,450 jobs lost
description: The online fashion retailer also buys the Wallis and Burton brands from failed retail group Arcadia.

description: Serena Williams says it was a "vintage" performance as she begins her Australian Open campaign in devastating style.

description: American musician Dave Grohl, spoke to the BBC about home schooling.

title: Only Man City collapse will stop title win now, but I don't see them cracking - Shearer analysis
description: Pep Guardiola has found a way to make Manchester City the team to beat again, says MOTD pundit Alan Shearer, and it is hard to see anything or anyone stopping them winning the Premier League title.

title: Covid-19: 'Lockdown won't stop our children being exploited'
description: Gangs are finding new tactics to groom children during the pandemic, police say.

description: Plans to update Covid vaccines for booster jabs and the impact of Storm Darcy feature in the papers.

title: Buccaneers beat Chiefs as Brady wins seventh Super Bowl
description: Tom Brady steers the Tampa Bay Buccaneers to a 31-9 victory over the Kansas City Chiefs to extend his record for Super Bowl wins to seven.

description: Watch highlights as Tom Brady guides the Tampa Bay Buccaneers to a 31-9 victory over the Kansas City Chiefs to win his seventh Super Bowl.

title: Online bullying: 'I've blocked nearly 10,000 abusive accounts'
description: Phoebe says she received 100 death threats in one day in 2020, and believes coronavirus is to blame.

title: Aids campaign: Thatcher 'fought against risky sex warnings'
